name: The Legend of Zelda $0 Budget
description:
Wow, what a... um, uh.... game..? this shit was made in google fucking slides so you already KNOW its top quality

you play as Link, trying to get the master sword taken from Ganon after getting siked out by a vape smoker.

travel anywhere other than anywhere, only house and ganon. yes.
